text: The Jamaica national under-17 football team represents Jamaica in youth international football team. They have attended the FIFA U-17 World Cup in 1999 and 2011. == Tournament records == === FIFA U-17 World Cup record === FIFA U-17 World Cup record FIFA U-17 World Cup record FIFA U-17 World Cup
